p: Antiproliferative properties were also depicted for the grape fruit essential oil [ 18]. Deng et al. detected by GC-MS twenty-four components (terpenes and oxygenated terpenes); the light phase oil displayed inhibitory effects on liver cancer cells proliferation, antimicrobial effects against Bacillus subtilis, Escherichia coli, Staphylococcusaureus and Salmonella typhimurium as well as antioxidant activity.
